data.title: Bexar County Clerk- Property Records
meta_keywords: lein; abstract judgement; home foreclosures; property auction; land records; real property
data.text:
You may contact the Bexar County Clerk regarding property information by calling (210) 335-2216. The County Clerk is located at 100 Dolorosa Suite 104 San Antonio, Texas 78205 and is operated Monday through Friday from 8:00am to 5:00pm.

This division handles:

Real Property/Land Records

Deed/Lien Information

Foreclosure Information

View more information here.
